Name: Juro Janosik
About the game: Juro Janosik is an action adventure about a Slovak legendary hero. As Juro Janosik you will take the law into your own hands and take an adventure across country of Slovakia. You will: Solve many puzzles, handle dangerous obstacles to get to castle: Fight with pandurs, tie them up with rope but never kill them because you are 'a good bandit': Search and liberate prisoners: Steal gold from castles and give it away to poor hardworking villagers: Join my Discord server: Features: 10 levels with real Slovak castles many puzzles and dangerous obstacles upgrading character skills mechanic for tying up enemies steam achievements full gamepad support * Supported using public funding by Slovak Arts Council
